parameters.name: destination
parameters.shortdesc: The text or insertion point inside the paragraph that the cross reference points to. The insertion point is always adjusted to the beginning of the paragraph.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new ParagraphDestination (Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the ParagraphDestination.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the ParagraphDestination with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the ParagraphDestination with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the ParagraphDestination with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the ParagraphDestinations within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The ParagraphDestination, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: ParagraphDestination, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The ParagraphDestination, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: ParagraphDestination, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first ParagraphDestination in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last ParagraphDestination in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle ParagraphDestination in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the ParagraphDestination with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the ParagraphDestination that follows the desired ParagraphDestination.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the ParagraphDestination whose index follows the specified ParagraphDestination in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The ParagraphDestination whose index comes before the desired ParagraphDestination.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any ParagraphDestination in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every ParagraphDestination in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ParagraphDestination.
Returns the ParagraphDestination with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
